title: Aashram
overview: A duplicitous, aashram based, Indian Godman's good deeds serve activities criminal and unholy, such as rapes, murders, drugs, vote bank politics and forced male emasculation. The law and a few crusaders investigate to bring him to account.

tv.episodeOverview: Baba comes to know about I.G. Sharma’s investigation on him after the CMs orders and he lays a trap for him, to which he falls prey. Sub Inspector Ujagar Singh in his investigation has led him to a lead inside the ashram named Kavita, but it is impossible to reach her or talk to her. Will Kavita take the risk to contact someone outside the ashram? New Hindi web show Ashram full episodes, star cast, storyline, videos & more available on MX Player for free.
